name: SpeakerText
description: SpeakerText is a video transcription company with a dead-simple web interface and well-documented API. Video publishers of all sizes have flocked to the service. Many use the video transcripts to boost SEO, others to create closed captions for accessibility, and still others to simply improve the viewer experience.

apis.name: SpeakerText
apis.description: SpeakerText is an online transcription service that provides transcription services for video and audio content. When the audio and video content is transcribed into text, it can be searched and shared.nnThe SpeakerText API allows users to access SpeakerText functionality in other applications. The two API methods are posting content for transcription and retrieving the text transcript.
